tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE class_schedule (
  class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  class_name VARCHAR(50),
  instructor_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE class_schedule (
  class_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  class_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  instructor_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
  end_time TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE instructor_availability (
  instructor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  instructor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  available_day VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  available_time_start TIMESTAMPTZ,
  available_time_end TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE class_schedule (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(255),
    instructor_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE attendance_data (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE class_schedules (
    class_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR,
    class_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE instructors (
    instructor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    instructor_name VARCHAR,
    speciality VARCHAR,
    availability_days VARCHAR[],
    availability_hours TIME[]
);

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id UUID,
    class_id UUID,
    student_id UUID,
    attendance_date DATE,
    is_present BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (attendance_id, class_id, student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE subscriptions (
    subscription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id UUID,
    subscription_type VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
